name: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
description:
Switch to the target character and creates 1 Omni Element.
(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: Switch to the target character and creates 1 $[K411].\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: Switch to the target character and creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: The gale gallops through the woods.
